Runty's Revenge (Runty's Revenge.bas.bin)
by Guillermo Gee
2018/10/15

An Atari 2600 game. It is a rom made about my dog Runty and my Wife chasing him around. This game must be played with an Atari 2600 emulator.


Download and Play in Stella (Atari Emulator) or any Atari 2600 emulator. 
https://squidsee.itch.io/runty
